comment: /**  * Resolve an error view for the specified details.  * @param request the source request  * @param status the http status of the error  * @param model the suggested model to be used with the view  * @return a resolved {@link ModelAndView} or {@code null}  */
code: /**  * Resolve an error view for the specified details.  * @param request the source request  * @param status the http status of the error  * @param model the suggested model to be used with the view  * @return a resolved {@link ModelAndView} or {@code null}  */ ModelAndView resolveErrorView(HttpServletRequest request, HttpStatus status, Map<String, Object> model).
